external_games.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - China D38 Schnabel Car - Full Pack

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: China D38 Schnabel Car - Full Pack
summary: The Chinese D38 Schnabel Car is a special type of freight car, used to transport super heavy or oversized goods. Generally speaking, it has two huge 'arms' to grab the goods, and make them become a part of itself. This pack includes the D38 Schnabel cars in both grey and red liveries.
